summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Taste-Fit Score feature addition to Unchained Coffee MVP. Backend APIs fully functional (23/23 tests passed including new taste-fit endpoints). TasteFitScore component successfully integrated on PDP and mobile views. Score card displays correctly between sensory profile and price sections, shows appropriate CTA when no profile exists.

integration_issues.issue: TasteFitScore component appears correctly in mobile drawer but may need better visual integration

passed_tests: Backend taste-fit score endpoint returns correct score when profile exists
Backend taste-fit score endpoint returns profile_exists:false when no profile
Backend taste-fit batch endpoint returns scores for multiple products
Backend taste-fit batch endpoint returns empty scores when no profile
All existing backend APIs still working (23/23 tests passed)
TasteFitScore component appears on PDP between sensory profile and price section
Score card shows 'Discover your Taste Fit' CTA when no profile exists
Score card positioning is correct (between sensory bars and price)
TasteFitScore component loads correctly on different products
Mobile responsive design works - score card appears on mobile
Mobile widget trigger button works correctly
Existing widget functionality preserved (mode toggle, tasting mode features)
Admin login still works with correct credentials
All existing PDP elements display correctly (product info, sensory bars, variants)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (23/23 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (core functionality working, score integration successful, minor mobile drawer visual consideration)
